import React,{useContext, useState} from 'react' import Plus from '../Assests/images/Plus.svg' import CommonDropDown from './CommonDropDown'; export const Context=React.createContext(); const Inputarea = (props) => { const [designer,setDesigner]= useState(0); const[frontEnd,setFrontEnd]= useState(0); const[backEnd,setBackEnd]= useState(0); const[qa,setQA]= useState(0); const[total,setTotal] = useState(0); // total=designer+frontEnd+backEnd+qa; // return(props.output)?(
Designer
{setDesigner(designer+1);setTotal(total+1)}} src={Plus}/> {designer}
Front End Developer
{setFrontEnd(frontEnd+1);setTotal(total+1)}}src={Plus}/> {frontEnd} {setFrontEnd(frontEnd-1);setTotal(total-1)}}src={Plus}/>
Back End Developer
{setBackEnd(backEnd+1);setTotal(total+1)}}src={Plus}/> {backEnd} {setBackEnd(backEnd-1);setTotal(total-1)}} src={Plus}/>
QA
{setQA(qa+1);setTotal(total+1)}}src={Plus}/> {qa} {setQA(qa-1);setTotal(total-1)}} src={Plus}/>
) :""; } export default Inputarea;
